dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.segment.stat.MarketStatistic
dataStructure.description:
A categorization of performance measures by MarketSegment. Performance is measured for the ServiceProvider and a ServiceProvider's Competitors in the market place.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: MarketStatistic

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the MarketStatistic.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains what the MarketStatistic is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: marketStatisicClassification
child.description:
A specification of what the MarketStatistic represents, for example a ProductProgram, ProductPromotion, ProductOffering, Branch, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: marketStatisicClassification

child.name: marketStatisticLevel
child.description:
Describes the place the MarketStatistic holds in a hierarchy of MarketStatistics. For example, director, executive, external, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: marketStatisticLevel

child.name: amount
child.description:
An number use to value the MarketStatistic, such as a percent. Mutually exclusive with the currencyAmount attribute.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: amount

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period during which the MarketStatistic is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: currencyAmount
child.description:
A current amount used to value the MarketStatistic. Mutually exclusive with the amount attribute.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: currencyAmount

child.name: marketStatisticType
child.description:
A division of MarketStatistic into groups because they exhibit common characteristics. For example, market penetration, churn, retention, market share, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: marketStatisticType

child.name: compositeMarketStatistic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompositeMarketStatisticComprisedOf

This association end is optional
child.label: compositeMarketStatistic

child.name: geographicArea
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketStatisticGatheredForGeographicArea

This association end is optional
child.label: geographicArea

child.name: marketSegment
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketStatisticGatheredForMarketSegment

This association end is optional
child.label: marketSegment

child.name: productOffering
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketStatisticGatheredForProductOffering

This association end is optional
child.label: productOffering

child.name: salesChannel
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketStatisticGatheredForSalesChannel

This association end is optional
child.label: salesChannel

child.name: partyRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketStatisticMeasuresPeformanceOf

This association end is optional
child.label: partyRole
